meanings.definition: Lacking neatness or order; untidy or messy.
meanings.sent1: The sloppiest room in the house is always my brother's.
meanings.sent2: Her handwriting is the sloppiest in the class.
meanings.sent3: Even though he tried to clean up, his room still looked sloppiest.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brushstrokes were so sloppiest, it seemed intentional.
meanings.sent5: The sloppiest pile of clothes on the floor made it hard to walk.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a lack of care or attention to detail.
meanings.sent1: The sloppiest work on the project was easily noticeable.
meanings.sent2: She made the sloppiest mistakes in her report.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at cooking was the sloppiest yet surprisingly tasty.
meanings.sent4: The painting's edges were sloppiest, giving it a unique charm.
meanings.sent5: The sloppiest wrapping job made the gift look unimpressive.

meanings.definition: Excessively casual or relaxed in manner or style.
meanings.sent1: He had the sloppiest attitude towards his responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: The party had the sloppiest dress code, but everyone had fun.
meanings.sent3: The cat's sloppiest stretch made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was sloppiest, but it suited her carefree personality.
meanings.sent5: The sloppiest handshake showed his lack of professionalism.
